sentences.sContent: Factoring in foregone experience and missed opportunities to develop skills, research shows that workers unemployed as young adults earn lower wages for many years following joblessness.
sentences.sContent_eng: Factoring in foregone experience and missed opportunities to develop skills, research shows that workers unemployed as young adults earn lower wages for many years following joblessness.
sentences.sCn: 调查显示，由于年轻人之前的经历，再加上错过了发展技能的机会，因此失业的年轻人在失业之后的许多年里，他们的收入也会相对较低。

synos.tran: 过去的；先前的；预知的；预先决定的

phrases.pCn: 预料之中必然发生的事情；不可避免的结局

words.tran: 发生在…之前；走在…之前（forego的ing形式）

trans.tranCn: 先前的， 过去的； 预知的
